description: The lastest game in the Lord of the Rings franchise, Tales of the Shire, is almost here. This "cozy" game puts you in the feet of Third Age hobbits just before the events of The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Rings. Your goal in Tales of the Shire is similar to that of other cozy games of its nature, and that's to start a new life in a town that could use a lot of work to make it home. Ahead of its late 2024 release, we got a chance to play the opening minutes of the Tales of the Shire. Here are the first 16 minutes of gameplay.
title: Tales of the Shire: The First 16 Minutes of Gameplay

description:
Altarium invites you on a dangerous journey filled with fear! In PvP and Co-Op modes, face your enemies, uncover secrets, and fight for survival, whether you're battling alongside friends or against rivals.

Only the strongest will survive Altarium... But will you?

On October 21, 2024, Altarium will be available on Steam. Discover it now, add Altarium to your Steam wishlist, and be one of the first to dive into the adventure as soon as it begins!

#Altarium #Horror #IndieGames
title: Altarium - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Watch the launch trailer for Copycat, an emotional cat adventure game developed by Spoonful Of Wonder. The game follows the story of a newly adopted shelter cat, who becomes the victim of an elaborate plan when a jealous, stray copycat steals her place in the household. Climb trees, fight dogs, and explore the neighborhood with intuitive, smooth cat-like controls. Copycat is available now for PC (Steam).

#Copycat #IGN #Gaming
title: Copycat - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Features trailer for Undisputed, an upcoming 3D third-person boxing combat game developed by Steel City Interactive. Players will step into the ring as legendary icons of Boxing past or up-and-coming undisputed champions of today. Check out the latest trailer to learn more about the game's gameplay mechanics, features, punch dynamics, defensive techniques, and more to become undisputed. Undisputed is launching on October 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Undisputed #Gameplay #IGN
title: Undisputed - Official Gameplay Features Trailer
